Name

year — A year

Synopsis

Content Model

(#PCDATA)

Attributes

NameTypeDefault
targetsCDATANone

Description

The year element contains a year number, along with a possible string that identifies the date system, such as “B.C.” or “A.D.”.

Parents

year may be contained in these elements: copyright, date, pubDate

Examples

<year>1995</year>
<year>240 A.D.</year>
